trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for lengths of <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisBreak" name="EmphasisBreak" href=""></xref> between spoken words.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值的长度<xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisBreak" name="EmphasisBreak" href=""></xref>朗读单词之间。

trans-unit.source: The break emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: 为<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>通过<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A><xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>对象返回<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A><xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>实例上的属性</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>的</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>属性</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>的实例</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>设置中断强调

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render breaks between words; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: 每个合成语音引擎可以自由地决定如何呈现词; 之间的分页符语言、 方言、 性别或语音之间不同的强调的性质。

trans-unit.source: Both EmphasisBreak and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: 这两个 EmphasisBreak 和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>时设置或获取可能使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>上<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>实例。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of EmphasisBreak are all less than zero and values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> are greater than or equal to zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: 两个值可能通过的事实，EmphasisBreak 的实际值是所有小于零和值进行区分<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>是大于或等于零; 并且，通过使用的值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>返回<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>属性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>返回对象<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>实例上的属性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>
